There was no Stern Show on Wednesday.  Howard took off I'm guessing because he's tired from AGT the night before and had AGT again that night.  It's BS I know.  They aired an old Sirius show from 2007.

Also,  I post my shows on the WDM Network first.  That is top priority and then I post them here when that's all done.  I have nothing to do with demonoid.  I also have a personal life... this isn't my job.  Sorry guys but I do the best I can.
